# Repository Architecture Reference

## Top-Level Structure

- `README.md`: workshop overview
- `AGENDA.md`: detailed schedule
- `challenges/`: challenge flow and tasks
- `participant/`: participant-facing materials
- `facilitator/`: facilitator-only materials
- `scripts/`: scoring and cleanup automation

## Ownership Pattern

- Participant docs: learner guidance and non-sensitive hints
- Facilitator docs: answers, delivery guidance, and curveball control
- Scripts: safe automation with clear usage documentation
